#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int main() {

	int t, n, i, sum;
	string s;
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		cin >> s;
		n = s.length();
		
		sum = 0;
		for( i = 0;i < n;i++ )
			sum += s[ i ];
		
		printf("%c\n", sum/n );
	}
	
	return 0;
}
